name: Ironfinger
details:
Distortion pedal with a full parametric mid equalizerThe IRONFINGER Distortion Pedal is based on the exact specifications of GRAVE DIGGER guitarist Axel Ritt. After 2 years of development together with Roland Schmidt of Pushking Pedals, a second to none distortion pedal with a full parametric mid equalizer has been created. The pedal is the only pedal in the world that has a fully parametric mid-tone control and thus enables an unprecedented sound variety.
http://www.ironfinger.de/
